Lab 11 - Part 3 - Game

Instructions

Note that ALL OF THESE FILES MUST BE SAVED IN THE LOCAL REPOSITORY THAT YOU CREATED FOR THIS LAB.

Try implementing this game!

game

  • combine keyboard events with animation
  • check for collision with paddle by determining if the circle’s y value goes greater than the height of the canvas minus the height of the rectangle… and the rectangle’s x value is between the x value of the rectangle and the x value plus the rectangle’s width
  • you can also check if the circle goes beyond the canvases bottom border… and stop the animation by using: clearInterval(animation)
